responseCode.description: The user input to accept/reject the override.

batchStage.description: Indicates which Stage of the  Batch and in which sequence number the service will run

batchEnvironment.description: Indicates whether service should run as a background process or a foreground process

verificationJobId.description: Same as jobID, but functionally it does the verififcation as to whether a job is completed before the jobID is executed

jobFrequency.description: Defines the frequency at which the job is processed next.

nextRunDate.description: Specifies bank date on which the job is to be next run

data.description: Used to pass any data values which may be required by the job when it is being run.

recordStatus.description: The status of the record processed

currNo.description: Current Number which indicates how many times the record is modified

inputter.description: This shows the user who entered the transaction

authoriser.description: This indicates the user who authorised the transaction

companyId.description: The identifier of the company, following the format CCGGGLLLL, where: CC is the country code, GGG is Company Group Code and LLLL is the Local Code. Country Code must be a valid countryCode, Company Group Code must be 3 numeric characters in the range 001-999 and must be a valid companyGroup. The Local Code is 4 numeric characters in the range 0001-9999, e.g. GB0010001

deptCode.description: This indicates the department code where the transaction was authorised

auditTimeDate.description: This indicates the audit date time

id.description: The Identifier of the record created

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

parse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

serverName.description: Hostname of the Server on which the service will run
